properties.label: Call Intelliflow
properties.query: SELECT id, name as ivr_name FROM yovo_tbl_ivrs WHERE is_deleted = 0

properties.label: Application
properties.query: SELECT name, CONCAT(name, ' | ', did) as display_name FROM yovo_tbl_route_inbound where type = 'rt-yovo-cc

properties.label: Extension
properties.query: SELECT name, CONCAT(name, ' ', extension_no) as display_name FROM yovo_tbl_sippeers WHERE category != 'trunk'

properties.label: Trunk
properties.query: SELECT id, name FROM yovo_tbl_sippeers WHERE category = 'trunk'

groups.label: Queue Selection
groups.query: SELECT name, name as display_name FROM queues WHERE deleted = 0

groups.label: User Queue Selection
groups.query: SELECT CONCAT('*_', name) as value, name FROM yovo_tbl_sippeers WHERE category != 'trunk'

groups.label: Variables Selection
groups.query: SELECT name, name as display_name FROM yovo_tbl_ivr_variables where ivr_id = {{intelliflowId}}

properties.label: WhatsApp Template
properties.query: SELECT jt._id as id, jt.name FROM yovo_tbl_whatsapp_integrations,JSON_TABLE(templates,'$[*]' COLUMNS (_id VARCHAR(50) PATH '$._id',NAME VARCHAR(255) PATH '$.name')) AS jt WHERE clientId = '{{whatsapp_template_gateway.clientId}}'

properties.label: API User

properties.label: Shopify Integration
properties.query: SELECT is.id, CONCAT(i.name, ' (v1)') AS `name` FROM yovo_tbl_integrations AS i JOIN yovo_tbl_integration_shopify AS `is` ON i.id = is.integrationId WHERE i.type = 'shopify' AND i.status = 1
